blog.name: 0344_reverse_string.md
blog.content:
# Reverse String

## Description

[doc](https://leetcode.com/problems/reverse-string/)

## Solutions

### First Idea

```javascript
/**
 * @param {character[]} s
 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify s in-place instead.
 */
var reverseString = function (s) {
  let low = 0
  let high = s.length - 1

  while (low < high) {
    const tmp = s[low]
    s[low++] = s[high]
    s[high--] = tmp
  }
}
```

-- Time Complexity: O(n)
-- Space Complexity: O(1)

/**

 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify s in-place instead.

var reverseString = function (s) {

  let high = s.length - 1

  while (low < high) {
